data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 2, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in Urawa.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Sapporo.
Urawa's Ryosuke Yamanaka misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Sapporo are coming forward and Anderson Lopes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
In the minute 14, Sapporo's Akito Fukumori is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Saitama.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Urawa to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Urawa throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Urawa.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Shinzo Koroki for Urawa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 30, Shinzo Koroki for Urawa is back on the field again.
Free kick Urawa.
Shinzo Koroki (Urawa) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Yuki Muto.
In the minute 33, Ryosuke Yamanaka of Urawa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 35, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Urawa.
Sapporo are pushing forward but Jay Bothroyd's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, Urawa have a goal kick.
Sapporo drive upfield and Akito Fukumori gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Urawa defender.
Hiroyuki Kimura has awarded Sapporo a corner.
In the minute 38, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Urawa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 40, Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Urawa takes a corner from the right.
Daisuke Suzuki of Urawa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo are coming forward and Yoshiaki Komai gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 43, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Urawa a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Akito Fukumori (Sapporo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
The first-half has ended.
Ryosuke Yamanaka (Urawa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Urawa's Koya Yuruki misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Sapporo drive into the zone and Jay Bothroyd is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 50, Urawa have a goal kick.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Yoshiaki Komai is on target to give Sapporo a 0-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Anderson Lopes.
In the minute 54, In Saitama Urawa attack through Yuki Muto. The finish is off target, however.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
In the minute 57, Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Urawa defenders.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 59, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kim Min-Tae.
Kim Min-Tae has recovered and rejoins the match in Saitama.
Tomoki Takamine is replacing Kim Min-Tae for the away team.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Kenyu Sugimoto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Urawa.
In the minute 64, Urawa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a second substitution, with Yuki Abe replacing Ewerton.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Daisuke Suzuki with Takuya Aoki.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 67, Sapporo make their second substitution with Douglas replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
Daiki Suga is on a sub for Lucas Fernandes for Sapporo.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 72, Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Sapporo make their fourth substitution with Kosuke Shirai replacing Takuro Kaneko.
In the minute 80, Ryota Hayasaka is replacing Jay Bothroyd for Sapporo at Saitama Stadium 2002.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Urawa.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Sapporo at Saitama Stadium 2002.
The home team have replaced Koya Yuruki with Tomoya Ugajin. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
The home team replace Katsuya Iwatake with Hidetoshi Takeda.
Anderson Lopes (Sapporo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 85, Sapporo take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Shunta Tanaka.
Great play from Akito Fukumori to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Urawa have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Free kick Urawa.
Urawa's Kenyu Sugimoto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Kenyu Sugimoto (Urawa) gets a yellow card.
Akito Fukumori for Sapporo has been booked by Hiroyuki Kimura and receives a first yellow card.
